verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> and Unleavened <S%G106><s%> Bread was two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> off; <S%G3326><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> were seeking <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> to seize <S%G2902><s%> Him by stealth, <S%G1388><s%> and kill <S%G615><s%> [Him;]
for they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Not during <S%G1722><s%> the festival, <S%G1859><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> there be a riot <S%G2351><s%> of the people. <S%G2992><s%>"

And while He was in Bethany <S%G963><s%> at the home <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> the leper, <S%G3015><s%> and reclining <S%G2621><s%> [at the table,] there came <S%G2064><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> with an alabaster <S%G211><s%> vial <S%G211><s%> of very <S%G4185><s%> costly <S%G4185><s%> perfume <S%G3464><s%> of pure <S%G4101><s%> nard; <S%G3487><s%> [and] she broke <S%G4937><s%> the vial <S%G211><s%> and poured <S%G2708><s%> it over <S%G2708><s%> His head. <S%G2776><s%>

But some <S%G5100><s%> were indignantly <S%G23><s%> [remarking] to one <S%G1438><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> "Why <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> has this <S%G3778><s%> perfume <S%G3464><s%> been <S%G1096><s%> wasted <S%G684><s%>?

"For this <S%G3778><s%> perfume <S%G3464><s%> might <S%G1410><s%> have been sold <S%G4097><s%> for over <S%G1883><s%> three <S%G5145><s%> hundred <S%G5145><s%> denarii, <S%G1220><s%> and [the money] given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%>" And they were scolding <S%G1690><s%> her.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Let <S%G863><s%> her alone; <S%G863><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you bother <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> her? She has done <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> deed <S%G2041><s%> to Me.

"For the poor <S%G4434><s%> you always <S%G3842><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> with you, and whenever <S%G3752><s%> you wish, <S%G2309><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> them good; <S%G2095><s%> but you do not always <S%G3842><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> Me.
"She has done <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> she could; <S%G2192><s%> she has anointed <S%G3462><s%> My body <S%G4983><s%> beforehand <S%G4301><s%> for the burial. <S%G1780><s%>

"And truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> is preached <S%G2784><s%> in the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> that also <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman <S%G3778><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> shall be spoken <S%G2980><s%> of in memory <S%G3422><s%> of her."

And Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> went <S%G565><s%> off <S%G565><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> Him to them.

And they were glad <S%G5463><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> [this,] and promised <S%G1861><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him money. <S%G694><s%> And he [began] seeking <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> Him at an opportune <S%G2122><s%> time. <S%G2122><s%>

And on the first <S%G4413><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of Unleavened <S%G106><s%> Bread, when <S%G3753><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> [lamb] was being sacrificed, <S%G2380><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Where <S%G4226><s%> do You want <S%G2309><s%> us to go <S%G565><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> for You to eat <S%G2068><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%>?"

And He sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G5217><s%> into the city, <S%G4172><s%> and a man <S%G444><s%> will meet <S%G528><s%> you carrying <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water; <S%G5204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him;

and wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> he enters, <S%G1525><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to the owner <S%G3617><s%> of the house, <S%G3617><s%> 'The Teacher <S%G1320><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> is My guest <S%G2646><s%> room <S%G2646><s%> in which <S%G3699><s%> I may eat <S%G2068><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> with My disciples <S%G3101><s%>?"'

" And he himself <S%G846><s%> will show <S%G1166><s%> you a large <S%G3173><s%> upper <S%G7012><s%> room <S%G7012><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> [and] ready; <S%G2092><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> for us there. <S%G1563><s%>"

And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and came <S%G2064><s%> to the city, <S%G4172><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> [it] just <S%G2531><s%> as He had told <S%G3004><s%> them; and they prepared <S%G2090><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>
And when it was evening <S%G3798><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> with the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And as they were reclining <S%G345><s%> [at the table] and eating, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that one <S%G1520><s%> of you will betray <S%G3860><s%> Me â€“ one who is eating <S%G2068><s%> with Me."
They began <S%G757><s%> to be grieved <S%G3076><s%> and to say <S%G3004><s%> to Him one <S%G1520><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> "Surely <S%G3385><s%> not I?"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, ["It is] one of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> one who dips <S%G1686><s%> with Me in the bowl. <S%G5165><s%>

" For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> [is to] go, <S%G5217><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written <S%G1125><s%> of Him; but woe <S%G3759><s%> to that man <S%G444><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%> [It would have been] good <S%G2570><s%> for that man <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he had not been born. <S%G1080><s%>"

And while they were eating, <S%G2068><s%> He took <S%G2983><s%> [some] bread, <S%G740><s%> and after a blessing <S%G2127><s%> He broke <S%G2806><s%> [it]; and gave <S%G1325><s%> [it] to them, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Take <S%G2983><s%> [it]; this <S%G3778><s%> is My body <S%G4983><s%>."
And when He had taken <S%G2983><s%> a cup, <S%G4221><s%> [and] given <S%G2168><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> He gave <S%G1325><s%> [it] to them; and they all <S%G3956><s%> drank <S%G4095><s%> from it.
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "This <S%G3778><s%> is My blood <S%G129><s%> of the covenant, <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is poured <S%G7062><s%> out for many. <S%G4183><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> again <S%G3765><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> of the fruit <S%G7032><s%> of the vine <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> that day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I drink <S%G4095><s%> it new <S%G2537><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
And after singing <S%G5214><s%> a hymn, <S%G5214><s%> they went <S%G1831><s%> out to the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, " You will all <S%G3956><s%> fall <S%G4624><s%> away, <S%G4624><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'I will strike <S%G3960><s%> down <S%G3960><s%> the shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> shall be scattered. <S%G1287><s%>'
"But after <S%G3326><s%> I have been raised, <S%G1453><s%> I will go <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you to Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>"
But Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to Him, "[Even] though <S%G1487><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> may fall <S%G4624><s%> away, <S%G4624><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> I will not."

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that you yourself <S%G4771><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> very <S%G4594><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> a cock <S%G220><s%> crows <S%G5455><s%> twice, <S%G1364><s%> shall three <S%G5151><s%> times <S%G5151><s%> deny <S%G533><s%> Me."

But [Peter] kept saying <S%G2980><s%> insistently, <S%G7060><s%> "[Even] if <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G1163><s%> to die <S%G4880><s%> with You, I will not deny <S%G533><s%> You!" And they all <S%G3956><s%> were saying <S%G3004><s%> the same <S%G5615><s%> thing, <S%G5615><s%> too. <S%G2532><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to a place <S%G5564><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Gethsemane; <S%G1068><s%> and He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Sit <S%G2523><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I have prayed. <S%G4336><s%>"

And He took <S%G3880><s%> with Him Peter <S%G4074><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to be very <S%G1568><s%> distressed <S%G1568><s%> and troubled. <S%G85><s%>

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "My soul <S%G5590><s%> is deeply <S%G4036><s%> grieved <S%G4036><s%> to the point <S%G2193><s%> of death; <S%G2288><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> and keep <S%G1127><s%> watch. <S%G1127><s%>"

And He went <S%G4281><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> beyond <S%G4281><s%> [them,] and fell <S%G4098><s%> to the ground, <S%G1093><s%> and [began] to pray <S%G4336><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> it were possible, <S%G1415><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> might pass <S%G3928><s%> Him by.

And He was saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Abba! Father! <S%G5><s%> All <S%G3962><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are possible <S%G3956><s%> for Thee; remove <S%G1415><s%> this <S%G3911><s%> cup <S%G3778><s%> from Me; yet <S%G4221><s%> not what <S%G235><s%> I will, <S%G5101><s%> but what <S%G2309><s%> Thou wilt."

And He came <S%G2064><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> are you asleep <S%G2518><s%>? Could <S%G2480><s%> you not keep <S%G1127><s%> watch <S%G1127><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>?

"Keep <S%G1127><s%> watching and praying, <S%G4336><s%> that you may not come <S%G2064><s%> into temptation; <S%G3986><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> is willing, <S%G4289><s%> but the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is weak. <S%G772><s%>"
And again <S%G3825><s%> He went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>

And again <S%G3825><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> for their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were very heavy; <S%G7102><s%> and they did not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> Him.

And He came <S%G2064><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time, <S%G5154><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Are you still <S%G3062><s%> sleeping <S%G2518><s%> and taking <S%G373><s%> your rest <S%G373><s%>? It is enough; <S%G568><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> has come; <S%G2064><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is being betrayed <S%G3860><s%> into the hands <S%G5495><s%> of sinners. <S%G268><s%>
"Arise, <S%G1453><s%> let us be going; <S%G71><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the one who betrays <S%G3860><s%> Me is at hand! <S%G1448><s%>"

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> while He was still <S%G2089><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> up, accompanied <S%G3326><s%> <S%G846><s%> by a multitude <S%G3793><s%> with swords <S%G3162><s%> and clubs, <S%G3586><s%> from the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the elders. <S%G4245><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he who was betraying <S%G3860><s%> Him had given <S%G1325><s%> them a signal, <S%G4953><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Whomever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I shall kiss, <S%G5368><s%> He is the one; seize <S%G2902><s%> Him, and lead <S%G520><s%> Him away <S%G520><s%> under <S%G806><s%> guard. <S%G806><s%>"
And after coming, <S%G2064><s%> he immediately <S%G2117><s%> went <S%G4334><s%> to Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Rabbi! <S%G4461><s%>" and kissed <S%G2705><s%> Him.
And they laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on Him, and seized <S%G2902><s%> Him.

But a certain <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who stood <S%G3936><s%> by drew <S%G4685><s%> his sword, <S%G3162><s%> and struck <S%G3817><s%> the slave <S%G1401><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and cut <S%G851><s%> off <S%G851><s%> his ear. <S%G5621><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Have you come <S%G1831><s%> out with swords <S%G3162><s%> and clubs <S%G3586><s%> to arrest <S%G4815><s%> Me, as against <S%G1909><s%> a robber <S%G3027><s%>?

"Every <S%G2596><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> I was with you in the temple <S%G2413><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and you did not seize <S%G2902><s%> Me; but [this has happened] that the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>"
And they all <S%G3956><s%> left <S%G863><s%> Him and fled. <S%G5343><s%>

And a certain <S%G5100><s%> young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> was following <S%G4870><s%> Him, wearing <S%G4016><s%> [nothing but] a linen <S%G4616><s%> sheet <S%G4616><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> [his] naked <S%G1131><s%> [body;] and they seized <S%G2902><s%> him.
But he left <S%G2641><s%> the linen <S%G4616><s%> sheet <S%G4616><s%> behind, <S%G2641><s%> and escaped <S%G5343><s%> naked. <S%G1131><s%>

And they led <S%G520><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> away <S%G520><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest; <S%G749><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the elders <S%G4245><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> gathered <S%G4905><s%> together. <S%G4905><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> had followed <S%G190><s%> Him at a distance, <S%G3113><s%> right <S%G2193><s%> into the courtyard <S%G833><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest; <S%G749><s%> and he was sitting <S%G4775><s%> with the officers, <S%G5257><s%> and warming <S%G2328><s%> himself at the fire. <S%G5457><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the whole <S%G3650><s%> Council <S%G4892><s%> kept trying <S%G2212><s%> to obtain <S%G2212><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to put <S%G2289><s%> Him to death; <S%G2289><s%> and they were not finding <S%G2147><s%> any.
For many <S%G4183><s%> were giving <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> testimony <S%G5576><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Him, and [yet] their testimony <S%G3141><s%> was not consistent. <S%G2470><s%>
And some <S%G5100><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up and [began] to give <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> testimony <S%G5576><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"We heard <S%G191><s%> Him say, <S%G3004><s%> 'I will destroy <S%G2647><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> made <S%G5499><s%> with hands, <S%G5499><s%> and in three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> another <S%G243><s%> made <S%G886><s%> without <S%G886><s%> hands. <S%G886><s%>'"
And not even <S%G3761><s%> in this <S%G3779><s%> respect <S%G3779><s%> was their testimony <S%G3141><s%> consistent. <S%G2470><s%>

And the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up [and came] forward <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3319><s%> and questioned <S%G1905><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Do You make <S%G611><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> answer <S%G611><s%>? What <S%G5101><s%> is it that these <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G3778><s%> are testifying <S%G2649><s%> against <S%G2649><s%> You?"

But He kept <S%G4623><s%> silent, <S%G4623><s%> and made <S%G611><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> answer. <S%G611><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> was questioning <S%G1905><s%> Him, and saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Are You the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the Blessed <S%G2128><s%> [One?]"
